name: Great White Shark
description: The Great White Shark is a large predatory fish known for its powerful build, sharp teeth, and impressive hunting skills. It primarily feeds on marine mammals and is found in coastal and offshore waters worldwide.

name: Hammerhead Shark
description: Hammerhead Sharks are easily recognizable by their wide, hammer-shaped heads, which enhance their sensory perception. They are skilled hunters that feed on fish, squid, and other smaller sharks.

name: Tiger Shark
description: The Tiger Shark is a large, solitary predator named for the dark stripes along its body. It has a diverse diet, eating fish, seals, birds, and even inedible objects, making it known as the 'garbage eater' of the sea.

name: Port Jackson Shark
description: The Port Jackson Shark is a bottom-dwelling species native to southern Australia. It has a distinctive harness-like pattern and a blunt head, feeding mainly on mollusks, crustaceans, and small fish.
